data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Is literacy (the ability to read and write) more important today than it was in the past? Why or why not? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: Some people believe that literacy is less important than it was in the past, while I am inclined to think that the ability to read and write is more important nowadays than in the past. Literacy is the ability to read, write, and use language to express social life or psychological activities in an appropriate way. This is an ability that becomes more and more important nowadays due to the fast development of the internet and the increasing amount of information on the website because people need to process information more quickly. In conclusion, it is essential for people to be able to read and write today. (108 字)
